sentences.cn: …耶酥被钉死在十字架上的那天。

sentences.en: But Pilate answered, You take him and crucify him.
sentences.cn: 我查不出他有什么罪来.

sentences.en: But then these critics crucify you, journalists try to burn you.
sentences.cn: 但是然后这些批评家又来抨击你, 记者们恨不得要毁了你.

sentences.en: But they continued to shout, saying , Crucify, crucify Him!
sentences.cn: 21无奈他们一直喊着说, 钉?十字架!钉?十字架!

sentences.en: But they cried out, Away with him, away with him, crucify him.
sentences.cn: 15他们喊着说, 除掉他, 除掉他, 钉他在十字架上.

sentences.en: Crucify Him not in thy mind nor in thy bodily activities.
sentences.cn: 不要在你的思想中、行为中将他上十架.

sentences.en: For even as love crowns you so shall she crucify you.
sentences.cn: 爱会给你戴上桂冠,也会折磨你.

sentences.en: For even as love crowns you so small he crucify you.
sentences.cn: 爱虽然可以为你加冕,但也能将你钉上十字架.

sentences.en: For even as love crowns you, so shall he crucify you.
sentences.cn: 正如爱给你加冠, 它也将你钉在十字架上.

sentences.en: For ever as love crowns you, so shall he crucify you.
sentences.cn: 因为爱为你戴上荆冠的同时, 也会将你钉上十字架.

sentences.en: If Christ were to come today, people would not even crucify Him.
sentences.cn: 倘使耶稣·督今天出现的话, 人们将不会把钉在十字架上.

sentences.en: If Jesus Christ were to come today, people would not even crucify Him. They would ask Him to dinner, and hear what He had to say, and make fun of it.
sentences.cn: 倘使耶稣·基督今天出现的话, 人们将不会把他钉死在十字架上. 人们将会请他参加晚宴, 听听他有什么好讲的, 然后拿他寻寻开心的吧.

sentences.en: Lk. 23:21 But they continued to shout, saying , Crucify, crucify Him!
sentences.cn: 路 二三 21无奈他们一直喊著说, 钉他十字架!钉他十字架!

sentences.en: Mk. 15:13 And again they cried out, Crucify Him!
sentences.cn: 可十五13他们又喊著说, 钉他十字架!

sentences.en: Pilate saith unto them, Shall I crucify your King?
sentences.cn: 彼拉多说, 我可以把你们的王钉十字架 吗 .

sentences.en: She'll crucify me if she finds you still here.
sentences.cn: 如果她发现你还在这儿，她会狠狠地教训我。

words.tran_cn: 执十字架的人；十字花科植物

trans.tran_cn: 折磨；十字架上钉死；克制
trans.tran_en: to kill someone by fastening them to a cross

trans.tran_cn: 把（某人）钉死在十字架上，折磨，虐待，抑制，克制，处以钉在十字架的死刑
